Sentencas: The impedance behavior of the archetypal Ni-YSZ/YSZ/LSM-YSZ solid oxide cells was investigated in reversible operation at different humidity conditions up to 90%.
Titulo: Pinning-down polarization losses and electrode kinetics in cermet-supported LSM solid oxide cells in reversible operation

Sentencas: The major electrode polarizations of the full cell at 850 degrees C are identified with the electrochemical polarization of the LSM-YSZ electrode modeled by three-parameter transmission line model and the gas concentration impedance of the Ni-YSZ electrode modeled by an ideal Gerischer element.
Titulo: Pinning-down polarization losses and electrode kinetics in cermet-supported LSM solid oxide cells in reversible operation

Sentencas: The gas concentration polarization increases with the dehumidification by the electrolysis, which is thus reduced by the increased ambient humidity.
Titulo: Pinning-down polarization losses and electrode kinetics in cermet-supported LSM solid oxide cells in reversible operation
Pinning-down polarization losses and electrode kinetics in cermet-supported LSM solid oxide cells in reversible operation

Sentencas: According to the non-faradaic chemical reaction controlled mechanism for the electrochemical reaction suggested by Mizusaki, diffusion-reaction parameter for LSM electrode was estimated from the transmission line model analysis.
Titulo: Pinning-down polarization losses and electrode kinetics in cermet-supported LSM solid oxide cells in reversible operation

Sentencas: Surface diffusivity is shown to enhance strongly with oxygen activity induced by electrolysis, which can be partly ascribed to the decreased surface adsorption capacitance as well as increased mobility.
Titulo: Pinning-down polarization losses and electrode kinetics in cermet-supported LSM solid oxide cells in reversible operation

Sentencas: Surface reaction rate increase essentially reflects the decreased adsorption capacitance.
Titulo: Pinning-down polarization losses and electrode kinetics in cermet-supported LSM solid oxide cells in reversible operation

Sentencas: The kinetics becomes more limited by the surface adsorption reactions but overall diffusion-limited, which is represented by the Gerischer-like response.
Titulo: Pinning-down polarization losses and electrode kinetics in cermet-supported LSM solid oxide cells in reversible operation

Sentencas: Less pronounced performance deterioration in SOFC operation may be ascribed to the mixed conduction contribution.
Titulo: Pinning-down polarization losses and electrode kinetics in cermet-supported LSM solid oxide cells in reversible operation
Pinning-down polarization losses and electrode kinetics in cermet-supported LSM solid oxide cells in reversible operation
